project.description: Build a full debug build of squawk-native from SVN. Build with assertions, debug code, assume, tracing, and interpreted gc.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.5.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.5.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH cd squawk-native java -jar build.jar clean java -jar build.jar copyphoneme java -jar build.jar -DPLATFORM_TYPE=DELEGATING -DTRACING_ENABLED=true -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=true -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=true -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=true -DNATIVE_GC_ONLY=false -DJ2ME.STATS=true -DTYPEMAP=true -DFULL_SLOT_CLEARING_ANALYSIS=true -DCHECK_SLOT_CLEARING=true -DTRUST_SLOT_CLEARING=false -DSUITE_VERIFIER=true java -jar build.jar -DPLATFORM_TYPE=DELEGATING -DTRACING_ENABLED=true -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=true -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=true -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=true -DNATIVE_GC_ONLY=false -DJ2ME.STATS=true -DTYPEMAP=true -DFULL_SLOT_CLEARING_ANALYSIS=true -DCHECK_SLOT_CLEARING=true -DTRUST_SLOT_CLEARING=false -DSUITE_VERIFIER=true -assume -tracing -typemap rom -strip:d -lnt -metadata cldc imp debugger
java -jar build.jar map -cp:cldc/j2meclasses:imp/j2meclasses:debugger/j2meclasses squawk.suite java -jar build.jar genspec java -jar build.jar jvmenv java -jar build.jar systemproperties java -jar build.jar Mnemonics java -jar build.jar OPC java -jar build.jar OperandStackEffect java -jar build.jar Verifier ./squawk -h ./squawk -version $HUDSON_HOME/bin/runsmoketest.sh DELEGATING $HUDSON_HOME/bin/rundsmoketest.sh DELEGATING
ls -l > sizereport.txt
mkdir tmp cp squawk squawk.suite squawk.suite.metadata tmp java -jar build.jar clean mv tmp/squawk tmp/squawk.suite tmp/squawk.suite.metadata . rmdir tmp
